verses.roman:
kaha, tomāra kavitva śuni' haya camatkāra"
krame rūpa-gosāñi kahe kari' namaskāra

synonyms: kaha—kindly let me know; tomāra kavitva śuni'-by hearing your poetic ability; haya—there is; camatkāra—much astonishment; krame—gradually; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; kahe—continues to speak; kari' namaskāra—offering obeisances.
translation: "Please tell me all this, for your poetic ability is wonderful." After offering obeisances to Rāmānanda Rāya, Rūpa Gosvāmī gradually began answering his inquiries.
